responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "5F2C9C22417284D09A86CE866DCE46A5", "They carry amber to me, and I sift through their finds. Some are smooth and light, while some are opaque and tough as arrowheads. The Zephyr Wind nomads find beauty in them, and it\'s hard not to agree. But me, I prefer the joys of heart and song.  If you\'re willing, you should take the amber fossils to one of their collection sites. They\'d be pleased to see it.")
name: EVT_SAN_0001_ScorpionCharmer_Quest_DLG_6_Response
